fields.summary: CLI: android - launch of the app on android emulator times out due to typo

comments.body: Tried twice, killing the emulator and adb before each test. The arm Android 4.4 emulator (my default) started and the app was launched successfully each time. That was not the case prior to this change. Passes.

Tested and verified the fix, using: 
Appcelerator Studio, build: 3.3.0.201405161313 
Titanium SDK, build: 3.3.0.v20140521074112 
Node.JS Version: v0.10.13 
NPM Version: 1.3.2 
acs@1.0.14 
alloy@1.4.0-alpha2 
npm@1.3.2 
titanium@3.3.0-alpha5 
titanium-code-processor@1.1.1 
Android 4.4.2 Emulator
